body:
* Added Hungarian translation
* Added Swedish translation
* Added Norwegian Bokm√•l translation
* Added Danish translation
* Added "swipe to refresh" in stations list
* Removed MapQuest-OSM support (they now require an API key)
- Add Japanese translation
- Add possibility to set the default tab to show when opening the app

- Add "Nearby stations" tab
- Add possibility to set custom API URL
- Always show Refresh button instead of Search button

- Add widget with favorite stations
- Add Italian translation
- Automatically update stations on app resume when data is more than 10 min old
- Fix some minor bugs

- Fix crash when opening map screen on Android 4.1 and under
- Fix typo in Polish translation

- Add Polish translation
- Add OSMBonusPack link in Settings

- Fix error with Call-A-Bike networks
- Keep current map center and zoom level on screen rotation
- Fix bug when searching in networks list
- Fix layout issue in stations list

- Add German, Portuguese and Spanish translations
- Update Turkish translation

- Store stations in database for offline use
- Add "last update" info
- Directly go to the networks list on first run

- Add Turkish translation
- Prevent crash in networks list screen when pressing search button with an empty list
- Add station address support for more networks

- Add search functionality in bike networks list
- Add station status and banking station status support for more networks
- Add station address for supported networks
- Strikethrough closed stations names in stations list
- Set preference summary to the value of the selected bike network

- Use Material theme on Android 5
- Add option to strip id from station name
- Add openbikesharing.org website link in About screen
- Provide Up button in action bar for Android 4.0
- Enable fast-scroll in stations list

- Target Android API 21 (Android 5.0)
- Replace bike marker on maps with circle marker indicating bike availability
- Optimize layout on tablets
- Do not re-download stations on screen rotation

- Fix layout bug on Android 4.2 devices
- Automatically download stations after closing Settings screen on first run
- Add summary to "Map layer" preference

- Add more information in Station screen (bonus, banking, status)
- Add button to center map to user location
- Add search box in stations list screen

- Use clustered markers on the map
- Display bubble when clicking on a station
- Fix crash on tablets when opening Settings screen

- Make the Refresh option really refresh the list of stations
- Fix station not being added/removed to/from favorites after app restart
- Add links in Settings screen

- Add bikes availability in stations list
- Fix crash on tablets when opening Preferences screen
First stable release

- Add favorite stations support
- Update French translation
- Add Directions option from Station screen
- Fix map not correctly centered
